import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../Assests/star_icon.png' import star_dull_icon from '../Assests/star_dull_icon.png' const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props const {addRoCart} = useContext return (

{product.name}

{99}

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
A lightweight,usually knitted,pullover shirt,close-fiiting and a round neck and short sleeves

Select Size

S
M
L
XL
XXL

Category:Women, T-Shirt, Crop Top

Tags:Modern, Latest

) } export default ProductDisplay
